oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wayne Morris interview
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Morris, Wayne; Vietnam War, 1961-1975
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Col. Wayne Morris was 4th Platoon Leader, with the 199th Light Infantry Brigade, serving in-country from October 1967 to September 1968.
